note: Jeju Island packages include the cost of domestic airfare. Early booking of flights and accommodation is essential during peak season (July–August). Seasonal flowers: Spring (March–April) canola flowers and cherry blossoms — iconic backdrops at Seongsan Ilchulbong and Sanbangsan, Summer (June–July) hydrangeas — Hueree Nature Park and Camellia Hill, Autumn (October–November) silver grass — Sangumburi Crater and Saebyeol Oreum, Winter (December–February) Hallasan snowscape and camellia flowers. Popular Instagram spots: Hyeopjae Beach emerald sea, Sagye Coast with Sanbangsan and canola flowers, Cafe The Mong coastal view, Aewol Cafe Street. For honeymoon and newlywed travellers, Jeju only or Seoul + Jeju combination is recommended as a priority.
